com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.arrays

Class IntArrayCodec

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datastax.driver.core.TypeCodec<T>
      • com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.arrays.AbstractArrayCodec<T>
        • com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.arrays.AbstractPrimitiveArrayCodec<int[]>
          • com.datastax.driver.extras.codecs.arrays.IntArrayCodec

  • public class IntArrayCodec
extends AbstractPrimitiveArrayCodec<int[]>
    A codec that maps the CQL type list<int> to the Java type int[].

    Note that this codec is designed for performance and converts CQL lists directly to int[], thus avoiding any unnecessary boxing and unboxing of Java primitive int values; it also instantiates arrays without the need for an intermediary Java List object.
